mapper.insert: MERGE INTO USER2.AIR_INFO A USING DUAL ON (A.TMFC = #{tmFc}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.ICAO_CODE = #{icaoCode}, A.AIRPORT_NAME = #{airportName}, A.WD = #{wd}, A.WS = #{ws}, A.TA = #{ta}, A.QNH = #{qnh} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.ICAO_CODE, A.AIRPORT_NAME, A.TMFC, A.WD, A.WS, A.TA, A.QNH ) VALUES ( #{icaoCode}, #{airportName}, #{tmFc}, #{wd}, #{ws}, #{ta}, #{qnh} )
